MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the LL32 postcode area of Conwy is still ongoing. This is due to on site difficulties and we now expect power to be back on by 5:00PM.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:58PM on 4th December 2020.
